singleItemContent: Tell me a little about your hometown.
Which part of your country  do most people live in?
Tell me about the main industries in your country.
What are some of the good things and some of the bad things about living in your country?
Describe a piece of clothing that someone gave to you.
And explain why this person gave you this piece of clothing?
Why do people dress casually in daily life and dress formally at work?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of wearing a uniform at work and school?
Why do people from different countries wear different clothes?
